016package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.Database;
021import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
022import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
023import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
024import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao.StudentDao;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao.UserDao;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao.ZoomMeetingDao;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.Student;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.User;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.ZoomMeeting;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.ZoomAttendanceDatabase.Converters;
032import java.time.Instant;
033
034
035@Database(
036    entities = {User.class, Student.class, ZoomMeeting.class},
037    version = 1
038)
039@TypeConverters({Converters.class})
040public abstract class ZoomAttendanceDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
041
042  /**  Name of SQLite database file. */
043  public static final String NAME = "starter"; // TODO Change to more app-specific value.
044
045  ZoomAttendanceDatabase() {
046    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML generation for Javadocs.
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Returns an instance of a {@link UserDao} implementation, providing persistence operations on
051   * instances of the {@link User} entity class.
052   */
053  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
054
055  public abstract StudentDao getStudentDao();
056
057  public abstract ZoomMeetingDao getZoomMeetingDao();
058
059
060  /**
061   * Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just {@link Instant}) to one of
062   * those supported by Room/SQLite.
063   */
064  public static class Converters {
065
066    /**
067     * Returns the specified {@link Instant} {@code value} as a {@link Long}, corresponding to the
068     * number of milliseconds elapsed since {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00} encapsulated within
069     * {@code value}. When {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
070     *
071     * @param value Input {@link Instant}
072     * @return Epoch milliseconds encapsulated in {@code value}.
073     */
074    @TypeConverter
075    @Nullable
076    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
077      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Returns an {@link Instant} instance containing the specified {@link Long} {@code value} epoch
082     * milliseconds. That is, {@code value} is interpreted as a number of milliseconds elapsed since
083     * {@code 1970-01-01 00:00:00+00:00}, and the corresponding {@link Instant} is returned. When
084     * {@code value} is {@code null}, this method returns {@code null} as well.
085     *
086     * @param value Epoch milliseconds.
087     * @return {@link Instant} corresponding to {@code value}.
088     */
089    @TypeConverter
090    @Nullable
091    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
092      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
093    }
094
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
099   */
100  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
101
102    @Override
103    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
104      super.onCreate(db);
105      // TODO Obtain DAO instances from database, and use them to perform any required preloads, e.g.
106      //  LocalDatabase database = LocalDatabase.getInstance();
107      //  etc.
108//      ZoomAttendanceDatabase zoomAttendanceDatabase = ZoomAttendanceDatabase.getUserDao();
109//      ZoomAttendanceDatabase zoomAttendanceDatabase1 = ZoomAttendanceDatabase.getStudentDao();
110//      ZoomAttendanceDatabase zoomAttendanceDatabase2 = ZoomAttendanceDatabase.getZoomMeetingDao();
111    }
112
113  }
114
115}
